head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ¶ ¶ ending ¶ 31st Decembe...

div.p: S80/833, unit 1123, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter
'Month' probably intended, the estimated expenditure on salaries being one-twelfth of the amount allocated for the year.
ending 31st December 1879.

cell.p:
Paper for Lithograms
The next item has been deleted: 'Towards Flora Australiensis | 25 | 20 16 8 | - - - '.

cell.p: Total — One hundred and sixy nine pounds three shillings and four pence
